mapper.insert: insert into shop (owner_id, area_id, shop_category_id, shop_name, shop_description, shop_address, phone, shop_img, create_time, last_edit_time, advice) values (#{ownerId}, #{areaId}, #{shopCategoryId}, #{shopName}, #{shopDescription}, #{shopAddress}, #{phone}, #{shopImg}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{advice});
mapper.select: select shop_id, owner_id, area_id, shop_category_id, shop_name, shop_description, shop_address, last_edit_time, phone, shop_img, enable_status from shop where shop_id = #{shopId};
select shop_id, shop_name, shop_description, shop_address, phone, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status from shop
